statements: DELETE FROM performance_data WHERE robot_id = 3 AND cpu_usage > 90;
DELETE FROM workflow_optimization WHERE system_id = 10 AND optimization_status = 'completed';
DELETE FROM workflow_optimization WHERE system_id = 200 AND optimization_status = 'Completed';
DELETE FROM MaintenanceLogs WHERE robotic_system_id = 101 AND maintenance_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM PerformanceMetrics WHERE robotic_system_id = 102 AND performance_score < 0.6;
DELETE FROM MaintenanceLog WHERE robot_id IN (SELECT robot_id FROM Robot WHERE robot_type = 'Industrial');
